title: BCI-bot
description: Aim of this project is controlling tbe motion of a rover using a BCI. In this, we would be dealing with different aspects of neurology, lots of deep learning and computing algorithms, circuitry as well as robotics.

title: Aerodynamics Club Website Development
description: The Aerodynamics club has been developing its website which plans to showcase our ongoing projects, have interesting articles amongst other features.

title: AR StoryboARD
description: Aim is to create a real world product which will be released. It will have virtual AR rooms which you can buy. Contributers will be working on creating own rooms or working on other's previously made rooms.

title: Externally Randomized Encryption Service
description: We aim to create a robust encryption service using a randomly generated key and suitable algorithms. This project aims to make a more secure encryption service by relying on external, more truly random processes for key generation.

title: Drone Automation
description: Automating a drone to avoid obstacles using reinforcement learning
